metadata.title: CVE-2023-5679 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Enabling both DNS64 and serve-stale may cause an assertion failure duringrecursive resolution

criterions.comment: bind9: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
